charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to counts 1, 2 and 4 on September 18, 2018. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a total term of 10 months as to count 1; 10 months as to count 2 terms to run concurrently; 48 months as to count 4 Terms to run consecutive to Counts 1 and 2 for a total term of 58 months. The court makes the following recommendations to the Bureau of Prisons: That defendant be placed in the facility located in Leavenworth, KS or as close to the Kansas City area as possible so he may remain near his children and other family members. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of four (4) years on Counts 1 and 4 and 3 years on Count 2 for a total term of 4 years. Mandatory, standard and special conditions of supervision imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $300.00. No fine or restitution.

The court makes the following recommendations to the Bureau of Prisons: That defendant be placed in the facility located in Leavenworth, KS or as close to the Kansas City area as possible so he may remain near his children and other family members. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of four (4) years on Counts 1 and 4 and 3 years on Count 2 for a total term of 4 years. Mandatory, standard and special conditions of supervision imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $300.00. No fine or restitution.
Counts 3 and 5 are dismissed on the motion of the United States.

charges.charge_description: CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE - SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE(1s)

charges.charge_disposition: The defendant pleaded guilty to counts 1s and 2s on February 1, 2018. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 48 months as to each counts 1s and 2s to run concurrently for a total term of 48 months. The court makes the following recommendations to the Bureau of Prisons: The Court recommends that the defendant be designated to Cadre Oklahoma FCC so he may participate in the educational programs offered, or in the alternative, CI McRae, or any other facility in Georgia, so he can be near family. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years as to each Counts 1s and 2s to run concurrently. Mandatory, standard and special conditions of supervision imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $200.00. No fine or restitution.

The defendant pleaded guilty to counts 1s and 2s on February 1, 2018. IMPRISONMENT: The defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the United States Bureau of Prisons to be imprisoned for a term of 48 months as to each counts 1s and 2s to run concurrently for a total term of 48 months. The court makes the following recommendations to the Bureau of Prisons: The Court recommends that the defendant be designated to Cadre Oklahoma FCC so he may participate in the educational programs offered, or in the alternative, CI McRae, or any other facility in Georgia, so he can be near family. The defendant is remanded to the custody of the United States Marshal. SUPERVISED RELEASE: Upon release from imprisonment, the defendant shall be on supervised release for a term of three (3) years as to each Counts 1s and 2s to run concurrently. Mandatory, standard and special conditions of supervision imposed. CRIMINAL MONETARY PENALTIES: MSA: $200.00. No fine or restitution.
Dismissed upon motion of the government.
